issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Found a typo in Encrypted Shuffle documentation (STRICT_I6 --> STRICT_IE6).
The typo also appears in core-default.xml
fields.summary: Fix a typo (STRICT_IE6) in Encrypted Shuffle

comments.body: Posted a trivial patch to fix the typo.

This message was automatically generated.
The asf licensing warning  and unit test error are unrelated to this patch, as this patch only modified documentation and the description of a core-default.xml property.
Patch LGTM. +1. Will commit it shortly.
I have commit the patch to trunk and branch-2. Thanks [~jojochuang] for the patch contribution!
Thanks [~djp] for reviewing and committing this!
